New Records: Virat Kohli broke Sachin Tendulkar's record for the most ODI centuries.
Mohammed Shami took 7 wickets, the best figures for India in an ODI.
India's 397-4 is the highest score in a World Cup knockout game.
Key Match Events: Mohammed Shami's crucial wickets turned the game around.
Virat Kohli and Shreyas Iyer formed a key partnership.
New Zealand's batting collapse was a turning point.
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as favorites due to home advantage.
Michael Vaughan praised India's batters for their peak performance.
Post-Match Reflections: Kane Williamson acknowledged India's dominance and praised his team's effort.
Rohit Sharma discussed the challenges and highlighted Mohammed Shami's crucial role.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India ended their ICC trophy drought, winning their first title since 2013.
New Zealand's campaign was affected by injuries.
Michael Vaughan noted Shami's performance and India's dominance.
Others: The match saw high scores and significant player contributions.
The World Cup final was firmly in India's sights after the win.
